components.name: style.css
Visualization.js

variables.name: Extrusion Factor
variables.descr: Height metric will be multiplied by this factor.  If the values are small then use a high number to get the extrusions to show up.  If values are too big then use a fraction to scale the extrusions down.

variables.name: Admin 0 Group By
variables.descr: Field name to group on for Admin.  Must be actual field name, not Zoomdata label for field.

variables.name: Height
variables.descr: Values control the extruded height of the polygon

variables.name: Color
variables.descr: Color areas based on this metric

variables.name: Layer Opacity
variables.descr: Decimal value between 0 and 1 for how opaque the layer is.  0 is completely transparent, 1 is opaque, .5 is 50% transparent
